title: IKEA gone WILD - Bluetooth Party Speaker
description: Bluetooth speakers made by IKEA is not an unusual product for them, but is it any good?  Buy IKEA Frekvens Bluetooth Speakers at IKEA:   On Amazon (Paid Link):   Buy Bluetooth Speakers On Amazon (Paid Link):  On Walmart (Paid Link):  On NewEgg (Paid Link):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
